sentences.cn: …挥之不去的汽车尾气的独特气味。

sentences.en: Anti-perspirants stop wetness, deodorants stop odour.
sentences.cn: 抗汗剂防止汗湿，除臭剂去除臭味。

sentences.en: At meal times the odour of sauerkrant vies with that of garlic.
sentences.cn: 吃饭的时候,德国泡菜的气味和大蒜的气味互相竟争着.

sentences.en: He was acutely aware of the odour of cooking oil.
sentences.cn: 他闻到一股浓浓的油烟味。

sentences.en: I love the delightful odour of freshly roasted coffee beans.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢新烘咖啡豆的清香气味.

sentences.en: It has the odour of musk.
Low-odour paints help make decorating so much easier.
sentences.cn: 气味小的油漆会使装修轻松很多。

sentences.en: She carried the odour of sanctity about her.
The field gives forth an odour of spring.
sentences.cn: 田野散发出春天的气息.

sentences.en: The house was filled with foul odour.
sentences.cn: 房间里充满了难闻的气味.

sentences.en: The odour of food may be a trigger for man's appetite.
sentences.cn: 食物的香味能引起人的食欲.

sentences.en: The odour of vitamin in skin is repugnant to insects.
sentences.cn: 昆虫很讨厌皮肤内维生素的气味。

sentences.en: The plant has an unpleasant odour and an acrid taste.
sentences.cn: 这种植物闻着刺鼻，吃着辣口。

sentences.en: The poor boy smelled the delicious odour of cooked meat.
sentences.cn: 这可怜的孩子闻到了香喷喷的肉味.

sentences.en: The room held the faint, sweet odour of pipe tobacco.
sentences.cn: 房间内有烟斗烟丝的淡淡馨香。

sentences.en: The studio was filled with the rich odour of roses.
sentences.cn: 工作室里弥漫着玫瑰花浓郁的香气.
